Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core

package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core
Contains classes that connect Kyanite to native APIs; those are meant for internal use only.
  • Class
    Description
    Const
    Interface for read-only objects.
    ExPtr
    Holds index definitions for the SFMLNativeObject.exPtr ("Extra Pointers") array.
    Intercom
    Annotation for intercom-critical types, fields, methods and constructors.
    IntercomHelper
    Provides functionality to encode and decode data structures used for intercom methods.
    KyaniteException
    Exception class for severe Kyanite faults.
    KyaniteStorage
    An internal utility class for managing temporary and binary files stored and used by Kyanite.
    KyaniteStorage.TemporaryFile
    Represents a temporary file stored inside of the Kyanite's home storage.
    NativeRef<T>
    Helper class for managing Java object references and related native pointers.
    SFMLError
    Error class for severe SFML faults.
    SFMLErrorCapture
    Provides methods to capture output to sf::err().
    SFMLInputStream
    Pipe for enabling stream from a Java InputStream into an sf::InputStream.
    SFMLInputStream.NativeStreamRef
    Native pointer manager for an SFMLInputStream bound natively to an sf::InputStream.
    SFMLNative
    Native library loader.
    SFMLNativeObject
    Abstract base class for classes bound to SFML C++ objects.
    StreamUtil
    Provides stream utility functions used by Kyanite-internal file reading and writing methods.
    UnsafeOperations
    Provides inherently unsafe operations on native SFML objects.
